p: The rrs PCR assay was performed on the 64 samples which were positive for Leptospira. After 25 of these samples returned negative results following direct PCR, they were then analyzed by nested PCR. All PCR products were then sequenced and the Leptospira species were categorized based on phylogenetic analysis of the rrs fragment. Four species were determined: L. borgpetersenii (n = 36), L. interrogans (n = 25), L. kirschneri (n = 2) and L. weilli (n = 1).
